```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
atl <- read_csv("atlantahawks.csv", col_type = cols(.default = col_double(), 
                                                    name = col_character(), 
                                                    position = col_character(), 
                                                    height = col_character(),
                                                    wingspan = col_character(),
                                                    weight = col_character(),
                                                    dob = col_character(), 
                                                    beforenba = col_character(),
                                                    acquired = col_character(),
                                                    signedusing = col_character(),
                                                    currentcontract = col_character(),
                                                    contractdetails = col_character(),
                                                    positionbreakdown = col_character()
                                                    )) %>%
  slice(1:19) %>%
  subset(select = -c(position_1, X41, X42))

bos <- read_csv("bostonceltics.csv", col_type = cols(.default = col_double(),

                                                    )) %>%
```
